00124 static inline void usb_req_add_buffer(struct usb_request *req,
00125                 struct buffer *buf)
00126 {
00127         slist_insert_tail(&req->buf_list, &buf->node);
00128 }

00142 static inline struct buffer *usb_req_get_first_buffer(
00143                 struct usb_request *req)
00144 {
